album: The State vs. Radric Davis II: The Caged Bird Sings
lyrics:
"#Mentionme" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "#Mentionme" [Intro:] Wussup niggas? Where my trap boys at? I'm talkin Mike Will Aye ya'll wanna talk about some getting money Make shit in the club with Guwop [Verse 1:] I'm riding down Bouldercrest, and the car ain't even out yet My neck cost a click, label deal and you pull a check Ways in team fade, got yo bitch lovesick Homosexual faggot niggas, man ya'll on that fuck shit Bought a Rari and another Rari Spent, I spent a fuckin fraction I just played a cop that I was drunk, don't cut man I just won't They said that Gucci Mane be runnin dues, woke up was runnin numbers Makin money's not a problem then we got something in common It's like them convos keep on comin to me, runnin runnin runnin to me Throw my pencil stick, my handout Told yo hoe to run that molly to me You got a payment for you lately I got foreign bitch trick trickin on me Yellow Rollie pay attention, red Bentley, Robert Griffin [Hook:] Mention me, mention mention me How you mention hustling if you ain't mention me? Mention me, mention mention mention me How you mention trapping if you ain't mention me? Mention me, mention mention mention me How you mention pimping if you ain't mention me? Mention me, mention mention mention me How you mention looting if you ain't mention me? [Verse 2:] Gucci Mane perverted, my rap attach you heard it Do not disturb on the door because yo girlfriend get you murdered My watch cost a birdie and a birdie and a birdie All this Burbery clothing got your girlfriend nervous Bust a bitch up behind a Maybach curtain Got 10 shooters with me like the secret damn service And I push that dope, I push that dope, my bitch so curvy They call me Benny Jackson how I microwave workin And that thing in this dirty when it's clean when it's clean Got a queen named Selene when she jump out of some dreams Yella yellow strapped on me, I'm in some limit purple wing And I don't never turn down nigga Think this shit a dame? [Hook: x2] Mention me, mention mention me How you mention hustling nigga if you ain't mention me? Mention me, mention mention mention me How you mention trapping nigga if you ain't mention me? Mention me, mention mention mention me How you mention pimping nigga if you ain't mention me? Mention me, mention me mention me How you mention gooning nigga if you ain't mention me?
